name: @bdombro/serverless-fullstack
description: Example application for running a Node API app on AWS Lambda using Amazon API Gateway.

scripts.dev: dbName=public dbHost=0.0.0.0 dbUser=admin dbPassword=supercrazysecretpassword ts-node-dev --transpile-only src/server.ts
scripts.dev:mysql: docker run -it --rm --name serverless-mysql -p 3306:3306 -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=supercrazysecretpassword -e MYSQL_DATABASE=public -e MYSQL_USER=admin -e MYSQL_PASSWORD=supercrazysecretpassword mysql:5.7
